description: This file defines a Java interface named Expression for evaluating expressions within a substitution framework. It includes licensing information, package declaration, import statements, and a single method for evaluating the expression with a given substitution context.

classes.name: Expression
classes.description: A Java interface representing an evaluatable expression that resolves variables via a Substitution object and returns whether the evaluation was successful.

methods.name: evaluate
methods.description: Evaluates the expression using the provided Substitution object and returns true if successful.
